items.name: Air Hogs Altitude Video Drone
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Record anywhere you fly as you capture video from high above the ground with the Air Hogs Altitude Video Drone. The Video Drone is a 3-channel, gyro-stabilized heli with a built-in camera. The onboard memory instantly stores your aerial footage and photography. Engage in surveillance missions around your house or create your own movies with cool aerial footage. The Altitude Video Drone is built with crash-resistant materials designed to completely protect the onboard camera within its core. Capture crash-landing footage as you compile your Air Hogs premiere movie. Master and capture the skies with the high-performance Air Hogs Altitude Video Drone.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Air Hogs Altitude Video Drone:</b><ul><li style="list-style: none"><p><b>This product may require registration with the FAA prior to operation. To learn more, please visit <a href="http://www.faa.gov/uas/registration/">www.faa.gov/uas/registration</a></b></p></li><li>Capture footage from take off to high above the ground and landing back down</li><li>The Video Drone's onboard memory instantly stores your aerial video recording and photography</li><li>The Altitude Video Drone is specially designed with crash-resistant materials to protect the on-board camera within its core</li><li>The Air Hogs Video Copter is for ages 8 and up</li><li>For indoors use only</li><li>3 AAA batteries required for operation (batteries not included)</li><li>Includes: 1 Air Hog Altitude Video Drone, 1 Remote Control, 1 Instruction Manual</li></ul>

items.name: Swift Stream Z-9 Remote Control 12" Camera Drone, White
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Record video and take photos flying inside or outside with this versatile drone, which displays footage right on your smartphone. This multifunction drone performs 360-degree flips, flies forward and backward and ascends and descends with ease via an included 2.4GHz transmitter, which is easy to use and read thanks to an LCD screen. Install the free app, available for Apple and Android devices, and start snapping still images and streaming video in real-time straight to your smartphone via the drone's built-in WiFi. Equipped with eight built-in LED lights, this drone can fly safely even at night. It also works both indoors and outside, so you can get a bird's-eye view of your house or sneak a peek at your opponent's Scrabble tiles.<br>
items.longDescription: <strong>This product may require registration with the FAA prior to operation. To learn more, please visit <a href="http://www.faa.gov/uas/registration/">www.faa.gov/uas/registration</a></strong> <br><strong>Swift Stream Z-9 Remote Control 12" Camera Drone, White:</strong><br><ul class="noindent"><li>Age Range: 14 years and up</li><li>5-channel control for aerial stunts</li><li>Flight time up to 7 minutes</li><li>Charge time up to 2 hours</li><li>Flight distance up to 200'</li><li>Record time up to 7 minutes</li><li>Easy to download app</li><li>Works with all smartphones</li><li>2.4GHz remote control</li><li style="list-style: none"><br></li></ul><p><span>For any questions about parts, service, repairs or support please contact:</span><br></p><p><span>866-296-2700</span><br> </p>

items.name: Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 Elite Edition (Sand)
items.categoryPath: Electronics/Surveillance Equipment
items.shortDescription: The Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 Elite Editing provides amazing footage streamed and recorded directly to your smartphone using the inbuilt 720p HD camera. The cutting-edge EPP design of the AR.Drone 2.0 ensures it has a robust structure.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 Elite Edition:</b><ul><li>Apple iPad/iPhone/iPod or Android 2.2 (Froyo) and up device controls AR.Drone 2.0</li><li>AR.Freeflight used to fly and pilot the AR.Drone</li><li>Record pictures, navigation data and videos and upload them instantly from the application</li><li>720p/30fps/H.264 encoding base profile</li><li>Low-latency streaming</li><li>Video storage on the fly with remove device or with USB flash drive</li><li>JPEG photo capture</li><li>Director mode — easily programs AR.Drone 2.0 automatic flights to record shots</li><li>Flight recorder GPS improves stabilization and allows user to view their flights in 3D</li><li>Includes AR.Drone 2.0, indoor hull, outdoor hull, charger and 1000mAh battery</li><li>Color: sand</li></ul>

items.name: DJI Phantom 4 Advanced Quadcopter Drone FPV Virtual Reality Experience includes Drone, Virtual Reality Viewer, Intelligent Flight Battery, Propeller Guards and 32GB microSDHC Memory Card
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.longDescription: ; Avoid obstacles automatically. Track moving subjects automatically using ActiveTrack. TapFly lets you fly with a tap of the finger. Smart Return Home allows the Phantom to avoid obstacles as it returns home. 28 minute maximum fight time, maximum control range of 3.1mi (5km). Maximum speed of 44mph (72kmh). Integrated gimbal for greater camera stability and smoother footage. Optimized Vision Positioning System raises positioning altitude up to 10 meters. AIRCRAFT ; Revolutionary Materials and Refined Aerodynamics - A new, specially designed, magnesium core increases the stiffness and rigidity of the Phantom 4 without compromising weight. Working in tandem with the battery, it lifts the center of gravity closer to the level of the props which increases agility and responsiveness. This is all placed within a sleek and aerodynamically efficient shell. Multiple Flight Modes - Switching flight modes to meet your needs, whether you are looking for simplicity and intelligent navigation, speed or smooth cinematic movements is easy. Fly Far for Longer - Fly for 28 minutes, an increase in effective flight time of 25% from the Phantom 3 Professional. Enjoy 3.1mi (5km) of range, with complete control and a live 720p HD view of everything the camera sees. ; VISION ; Sense and Avoid - Front obstacle sensors combine with advanced computer vision and processing to give the Phantom active obstacle avoidance that allows it to react to and avoid obstacles in its path. Additionally, DJI's Vision Positioning System has been refined, increasing its effective altitude by over 300% from the Phantom 3's altitude to 10 meters and sharpening up its positioning capabilities, allowing for greater security and confidence when flying indoors. TapFly - The Phantom 4 reacts to your touch. In TapFly mode, simply tap on the live view on your smart device screen to send it flying in that direction. With Obstacle Sensing Systems you can watch it fly without worry. ActiveTrack - Using ActiveT

items.name: Air Hogs RC Rollercopter, Blue/Silver
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Roll anywhere! Obstacles and gravity are no barrier for the ground-to-air RC Air Hogs Rollercopter! With its exterior rolling cage, pilots can drive across the ground, roll up walls, fly through the air or even roll across the ceiling! The cage also acts as a durable shield, protecting your heli from walls or other obstacles and preventing unforeseen crashes. It's a ground and air RC Heli made for non-stop action! The Air Hogs Rollercopter — roll anywhere!
items.longDescription: <br><b>Air Hogs RC Rollercopter, Blue/Silver:</b><ul><li>Roll anywhere</li><li>At lower power, Rollercopter will drive across the ground in its rolling cage</li><li>Throttle up to max power to take to the air and fly</li><li>With its exterior rolling cage, you can roll it on the ground, up walls and even across the ceiling</li><li>Rollercopter's durable rolling cage also acts as a protective shield, allowing it to bump into walls or objects without damage or crashing</li><li>The Air Hogs Rollercopter is made for pilots ages 8+ and requires 6 AA batteries to power the controller/charger</li><li>Includes: 1 Air Hogs Rollercopter indoor RC helicopter, 1 Controller/Charger, 1 Instruction Sheet</li></ul><br><b>Questions about product recalls?</b><br>Items that are a part of a recall are removed from the Walmart.com site, and are no longer available for purchase. These items include Walmart.com items only, not those of Marketplace sellers. Customers who have purchased a recalled item will be notified by email or by letter sent to the address given at the time of purchase. For complete recall information, go to <a href="http://walmartstores.com/Recalls/" target="_blank">Walmart Recalls</a>.

items.name: Minnie Mouse Flyin' Style Helicopter
items.categoryPath: Toys/Dolls & Dollhouses/Baby Dolls
items.shortDescription: Little ones will love taking fashion play to a higher level with this Minnie Mouse Helicopter. This cute and adorable toy will help the poseable doll get ready for the red carpet while flying to her destination. This toddler helicopter also comes with a vanity mirror and chair so Minnie Mouse can get all dolled up for a night on the town with Mickey. The spinning bow propeller adds a wonderful touch to the dainty and fancy toy that a little girl will adore. This flying helicopter toy also includes a display case that rotates when the propeller is spinning and the side door opens to reveal a mobile boutique.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Minnie Mouse Flyin' Style Helicopter:</b><ul><li>Age range: 2 years and up</li><li>Poseable Minnie figure</li><li>Spinning bow propeller</li><li>Flying helicopter toy has a display case that rotates</li><li>Includes helicopter, Minnie, mirror vanity and chair</li></ul>

items.name: DJI Phantom 3 Protective RC Quadcopter Drone Travel Carry Case
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: The DJI Phantom 3 Protective RC Quadcopter Drone Travel Carry Case will allow you to transport your device in style and with security. This quality unit features a durable black matte finish. It will protect your equipment from bumps and scratches. The lockable latches will give you the peace of mind that everything is secured tightly as you transport it from one place to another. This DJI Phantom carry case has a pre-cut foam insert that protects your drone, controller, batteries and accessories from exposure and damage. It will safeguard your drone with its rugged and durable design to give you the confidence that it's securely stored for travel wherever you go. It is backed with U.S. support and service. This DJI Phantom case is made from high-quality materials throughout and has an easy carry handle. It features a black and silver color for a distinctive look.
items.longDescription: <br><b>DJI Phantom 3 Protective RC Quadcopter Drone Travel Carry Case:</b><ul><li>Backed with U.S. support and service</li><li>DJI Phantom carry case features a precision pre-cut foam insert</li><li>High-quality materials throughout</li><li>Protect your investment in style</li><li>Fits these RC models: DJI Phantom 3</li><li>Safeguards against bumps and scratches</li><li>Lockable latches</li><li>Color: black and silver</li><li>Note: DJI Phantom 3 is not Included with case</li><li>Ideal for carrying your quadcopter safely while traveling</li></ul>

items.name: Swift Stream S-208 Remote Control 9" Helicopter Super Cobra
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: This awesome 3.5-channel RC helicopter comes ready to fly! It can be easily controlled in all directions — fly forward, backward, up down, left, right and hover! A built-in gyroscope automatically stabilizes the helicopter during flight. It offers built-in auto pilot and an infrared remote control. It features an eight-minute flight time and works over up to 40-foot distances.
items.longDescription: <strong>Swift Stream S-208 Remote Control 9" Helicopter Super Cobra:</strong><br><ul class="noindent"><li>Age Range: 12 years and up</li><li>Flight time up to 8 minutes</li><li>Flight distance up to 40'</li><li>Charge time up to 60 minutes</li><li>Built-in LED search light</li><li>Charge from remote control</li><li>Built-in auto pilot</li><li>3.5 channels</li><li>Calibration trim control</li><li>Includes spare bladesRemote control uses 6 AA batteries (not included)</li></ul><p><span>For any questions about parts, service, repairs or support please contact:</span><br></p><p><span>866-296-2700</span><br> </p>

items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Be your own director and tell your story as never before. Reach for the sky and capture professional-quality footage from a new perspective. With a crystal-clear camera, real-time HD video display, and intuitive flight controls, what will you create? Phantom 3 4K Features 4K Video / 12 Megapixel Camera Wi-Fi Video Downlink Maximum Transmission Distance of 0.75mi (1.2km) Easy to Fly, Intelligent Flight System 3-Axis Stabilization Gimbal Dedicated Remote Controller GPS & Vision Positioning System Fly up to 25 Minutes on a Single Charge DJI GO App Epic Aerial Video With the Phantom 3 4K, you're shooting 4K video at up to 30 frames per second and capturing 12 megapixel photos that look crisper and cleaner than ever. Built-in Wi-Fi, 3/4-Mile Range Linking your mobile device to your Phantom through the DJI GO app is easy with an enhanced Wi-Fi range extender that's built right into the remote controller. A high-powered 5.8GHz transmission frequency keeps the Phantom responsive, ...
items.longDescription: DJI Phantom 3 4K Advanced Quadcopter Drone with 4K Camera and 3-Axis Gimbal ; Includes: [Aircraft Body Remote Controller Propeller Pair x 4 Intelligent Flight Battery Battery Charger Power Cable Gimbal Clamp Vibration Absorber x 4 16GB MicroSD Card Micro USB Cable Anti-drop Kit x 2 Landing Pad x 4 Propeller Removal Clamp Stick x 5 (Gold, Silver, Red, Blue, Pink) Manuals] Be your own director and tell your story as never before. Reach for the sky and capture professional-quality footage from a new perspective. With a crystal-clear camera, real-time HD video display, and intuitive flight controls, what will you create? Phantom 3 4K Features 4K Video / 12 Megapixel Camera Wi-Fi Video Downlink Maximum Transmission Distance of 0.75mi (1.2km) Easy to Fly, Intelligent Flight System 3-Axis Stabilization Gimbal Dedicated Remote Controller GPS & Vision Positioning System Fly up to 25 Minutes on a Single Charge DJI GO App Epic Aerial Video With the Phantom 3 4K, you're shooting 4K video at up to 30 frames per second and capturing 12 megapixel photos that look crisper and cleaner than ever. Built-in Wi-Fi, 3/4-Mile Range Linking your mobile device to your Phantom through the DJI GO app is easy with an enhanced Wi-Fi range extender that's built right into the remote controller. A high-powered 5.8GHz transmission frequency keeps the Phantom responsive, even when flying at distances of up to 0.75mi (1.2km) away.* *Maximum flight distance may vary with environmental conditions and local regulations. 3-Axis Stabilization Gimbal With DJI's industry-standard gimbal stabilization technology, your camera is help perfectly stable no matter how you fly. This 3-axis gimbal makes complex shots and hovering for long exposure photos easy. Easy to Fly Your Phantom 3 4K fits into your life and makes flying remarkably intuitive and easy. From takeoff to landing, it's completely under your control, responding to your commands while automatically handling the most complex aspects of safe, stable flight. Safety Features A unique Beginner Mode helps you learn how to fly in a safe, limited area. Your Phantom 3 4K can be set to fly only within a given distance and altitude from you, protecting your Phantom and making it automatically stay inside your desired limits. Worry-Free Autopilot Automatic elements of your Phantom 3 4K's intelligent flight system help you fly and are available at the touch of a button. Auto-Takeoff: With one tap in the DJI GO app, your Phantom 3 will turn on its motors and rise to a pre-set height. It will then hover perfectly in place until you direct it where to go. Auto-Return Home: When GPS is available, your Phantom 3 remembers the exact spot that it took off from. Wherever your aircraft is flying, tap a button to have it return right back home. Failsafe: If the intelligent Flight Battery is running low, or if your Phantom 3 loses the connection with your remote controller for any reason, the aircraft will automatically return to the takeoff point and land safely. Vision Positioning for Indoor Flight Fly indoors, low to the ground, and in GPS-free areas with Vision Positioning technology. Visual and ultrasonic sensors scan the ground beneath your Phantom 3 4K for patterns, enabling it to identify its position and move accurately. Powerful Mobile App Complete power is at your fingertips. Control the camera and change flight settings, all from your mobile device. Plus: Compatible with most DJI products Instant video downloading Easy video editor Comprehensive media library Sharing and connecting creativity Live map and radar Detailed records and achievements Manage your DJI account More Flying, More Fun Fly up to 25 minutes on a single charge. The patented DJI Intelligent Flight Battery continuously tells you exactly how long you can continue flying, based on how far and at what altitude you are, and it alerts you when it's time to head back. This information is treamed live to the GO app on your mobile dev ...

items.name: Proto-Z Quadcopter Drone
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Joining the Drone lineup, is the brand new Proto-Z! Designed with the "beginner pilot" in mind, the Proto-Z is guaranteed hours of fun! Bright, built-in LEDs, one-button flip, true direction flight and a fast charge time makes this the ideal Drone for indoor flying! A 2.4GHz radio not only allows for interference-free flight but also allows for multiple Proto-Z's to fly at once. A 3.7V 100mAh LiPo battery, USB charge cord and spare rotor blades are also included in the ready-to-fly package. All you need to add are two "AAA" batteries!

items.longDescription: The Syma S026G Micro Chinook is a 3 channel helicopter. Now with GYRO built in for even more stability. The S026G comes fully assembled and is ready to fly right out of the box after you charge the battery. The 3-channel helicopter allows you to navigate the helicopter Up/Down, Left/Right and Forward/Reverse. Equipped with a battery that will give you 6-8 minutes of flight time per charge and a controller that only takes 6"AA" batteries, this helicopter is a steal. The auto stabilization and precision speed makes this mini indoor helicopter great for people who are curious about getting into this hobby, and this also makes the perfect gift for anyone that has a passion for aviation. Smallest micro tandem RC helicopter in the world! Great gifts for kids. Great toy for indoor entertainment!

items.shortDescription: Unleash heart pounding aerial stunts with the Air Hogs Helix Ion! The Helix Ion is an agile, responsive and extremely stable quad-copter that can perform incredible aerial stunts. Its four ducted fans are the secret to its agile flying performance. With gyro-stabilization, built in accelerometer and 2.4 GHz communication, optimal flight response is instantly at your finger tips. The Helix Ion is aggressively maneuverable and incredibly fast! Its full 4-channel control enables it to easily outfly any obstacle and out stunt any other RC vehicle. Nothing moves like this, its perfect for both beginners and advanced pilots! The patented Air Hogs ExoFrame construction protects all 4 propellers during bumps and crashes. Master the skies with the high-performance Air Hogs Helix Ion!

To learn more, please visit www.faa.gov/uas/registrationWonderTech Voyager 2.4GHz 6-Axis Gyro Drone Quadcopter with HD FPV Real Time Live Video Feed Camera, White:Age Range: 14 years and upLED Lights light up the nightBuilt-in 1MP FPV Real time live video feed video/picture camera will capture your high flying funCapture HD video and pictures while in flight and view them live via the drone's own wifi network on your Android or iOS compatible phoneFree Android or iOS app to get connected instantlyIncluded Bracket Works with GoPro's Hero CameraCapture stunning footage and images with the included HD FPV camera or take your own GoPro to the skies with the included bracket5-channel 2.4GHz eliminates interferenceFly multiple drones at once with friendsEasy for beginners to learn to fly right out of the boxFully equipped with 4 different speed modesRadio signal ideal for outdoor/indoor operationsControl Distance is more than 328'Compact handheld remote control offers a comfortable and convenient way to pilot the drone1 key to flip during flightWith built-in headless mode, this drone is easy for beginners to learn to fly right out of the boxHeadless mode will keep the drone flying forward/backward and side to side regardless of which direction the drone is facing1 press of a button will bring your drone safely back to homeOn-remote liquid crystal display showing battery capacity, transmitted signal strength, the aircraft's stall speed, throttle, forward and backward, flying side to side, trim, steering ratio and much moreEquipped with a full range multi-angle collision protection shell for the roughest of landings2.4GHz frequency band signal offers the pilot greater precision, improved responsiveness, enhanced distance control and allows for simultaneously controlling multiple drones with friends without mutual interferenceRemovable rechargeable batteryGOPRO, HERO, the GOPRO logo, and the GoPro Be a He

items.name: 2.4G 4-CH RC Quadcopter with 6 Axis Gyro and Lighting
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: This durable drone is very stable, easy to fly and controls smoothly. The 2.4 Ghz provides excellent battery life for flying in day, or by night using the 4 bright built-in LED lights.
items.longDescription: <p><b>This product may require registration with the FAA prior to operation. To learn more, please visit <a href="http://www.faa.gov/uas/registration/">www.faa.gov/uas/registration</a></b></p><p><br><b>2.4G 4-CH RC Quadcopter with 6 Axis Gyro and Lighting:</b></p><ul><li>Using spread spectrum technology, the Drone can go further, fly smoother and last longer</li><li>Built-in 6 axis gyroscope for precise flight and hovering</li><li>You can fly indoors or out</li><li>Continuous 360 degree rotation allows for amazing tricks</li><li>Right and Left handed throttle capable</li><li>Control mode: remote control</li><li>Distance: 30m</li><li>Battery: 3.7V 500mAh LiPO Battery</li><li>Charging Mode: USB</li><li>Charge time: 100 minutes</li><li>Play time: 7 minutes</li><li>Includes:<ul><li>RC Quad Copter</li><li>2.4G Remote Controller (does not include batteries)</li><li>USB Charging Cable</li><li>4 Rotor blades</li><li>4 Protection Frames</li><li>Card Reader</li><li>Screwdriver</li><li>3.7V 500mAh LiPO Battery</li><li>Instruction manual</li></ul></li></ul>

items.name: Air Hogs Axis 200 RC Helicopter with Batteries, Blue
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.longDescription: Air Hogs Axis 200 RC Helicopter with Batteries, Blue:Features 4 directional control and simple, intuitive control system to learn the basics of RC flightThe Axis 200's fly bar helps deliver inflight rotor stability for smooth handlingDurable construction withstands the toughest crash landingsThe Axis 200 requires 4 AA batteries to power the controller/charger (batteries included)Includes: 1 Axis 200, 1 controller/charger, 1 instruction guide, 4 AA batteries, 1 auto-correcting landing gear, 1 propeller protection stickAge range: 8 years and up

items.name: Swift Stream 2.4GHz 5 Channels 6-Axis Gyro Z-10 Remote Control Drone with Build In 0.3MP 640 x 480 Pixel Wi-Fi Camera, Black
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Record video and take photos flying inside or outside with this versatile drone, which displays footage right on your smartphone. This multifunction drone performs 360-degree flips, flies forward and backward and ascends and descends with ease via an included 2.4GHz transmitter, which is easy to use and read thanks to an LCD display. Install the free app, available for Apple and Android devices, and start snapping still images and streaming video in real-time straight to your smartphone via the drone's built-in WiFi. Equipped with eight built-in LED lights, this drone can fly safely even at night. It also works both indoors and outside, so you can get a bird's-eye view of your house or sneak a peek at your opponent's Scrabble tiles.<br>
items.longDescription: <strong>This product may require registration with the FAA prior to operation. To learn more, please visit <a href="http://www.faa.gov/uas/registration/">www.faa.gov/uas/registration</a></strong>  <br><strong>Swift Stream Z-10 Remote Control 19" Camera Drone:</strong> <br><ul class="noindent"><li>Age Range: 14 years and up</li><li>5-channel control for aerial stunts</li><li>2.4GHz remote control</li><li>WiFi camera included</li><li>Built in LED lights</li><li>Auto-return push-button</li><li>Easy to download app</li><li>Works with all smartphones</li><li>Rechargeable Li Poly battery</li></ul><p><span>For any questions about parts, service, repairs or support please contact:</span><br></p><p><span>866-296-2700</span><br> <br> <br></p>

items.name: Gravity Z Auldey Sky Rover Infrared 3-Channel with Gyro Indoor Helicopter, Red
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Get airborne with the Gravity Z Auldey Sky Rover Infrared 3-Channel with Gyro Indoor Helicopter. This colorful helicopter has infrared control for indoor use. It has a lithium rechargeable battery, Smart Circuit protection and can fly over six minutes. The remote control helicopter toy controller features a left/right trimmer and infrared controls. Two spare main blades, a spare tail blade, a fastener and a USB cable are included with the toy. Four AAA batteries are required for operation; batteries are sold separately.
items.longDescription: <b>Gravity Z Auldey Sky Rover Infrared 3-Channel with Gyro Indoor Helicopter, Red:<br></b><br><b>Helicopter:</b><br><ul><li>Rise, fall, turn left, turn right, forward, backward, stop</li><li>Flight time: more than 6 minutes</li><li>Control distance: 8 meters</li><li>Lithium rechargeable battery (included)</li><li>With Smart Circuit protection</li><li>USB charging</li></ul><br><b>Controller:</b><br><ul><li>A/B/C bands infrared control</li><li>Left/right trimmer</li><li>Sky rover helicopter, red requires 4 AAA batteries</li><li>Batteries sold separately</li></ul><b>Spare parts:</b> <br><ul><li>2 main blades</li><li>1 tail blade</li><li>1 USB cable</li><li>1 fastener</li></ul>

items.name: Syma S109G 3.5 Channel RC Apache Helicopter with Gyro
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.longDescription: The Syma S109G is a palm size 3-Channels Helicopter, it has a youngest brother in the Syma Apache line. The S109G has a Co-Axial structure which is specially made for first time flyers. The S109G is built with thick plastic body which always survives in crashes. The Syma S109G is equipped with a 4-in-1 receiver (Gyro, ESC, Mixer, Receiver), allows the helicopter to move in all directions. This hobby helicopter is designed for ages 8+.
